sentences.en: Being even moderately overweight increases your risk of developing high blood pressure.
sentences.cn: 即使是轻度超重也会增加患高血压的风险。

sentences.en: Classically, overweight people underestimate the volume of food that they consume.
sentences.cn: 一般来说，超重的人往往低估自己摄入食物的量。

sentences.en: Having been told by his doctor that he was overweight, he's eating all the fibre and fruit he can.
sentences.cn: 被医生告知超重后，他一直拼命地吃高纤维食物和水果。

sentences.en: He is slightly overweight.
sentences.cn: 他略微超重。

sentences.en: I do not know whether overweight this letter.
sentences.cn: 我不知道这信是否超重了。

sentences.en: I wonder if this letter is overweight.
sentences.cn: 我想知道这封信是否超重。

sentences.en: I'm overweight by 2 kg according to my doctor.
sentences.cn: 据医生说,我超重2公斤.

sentences.en: If your luggage is overweight, you'll have to pay extra.
sentences.cn: 假如你的行李过重了, 你得付额外的运费.

sentences.en: It is said that historians often overweight political aspects.
sentences.cn: 据说历史学家通常过分重视政治因素.

sentences.en: Overweight and sweating in the humid weather, she stamped from room to room.
sentences.cn: 她很胖，在潮湿的天气里浑身大汗，烦躁地在各个房间之间噔噔地走来走去。

sentences.en: Philosophers sometimes overweight their negativism.
sentences.cn: 哲学家往往偏重于否定态度.

sentences.en: She was grossly overweight.
sentences.cn: 她过于肥胖。

sentences.en: She was only a few pounds overweight.
sentences.cn: 她只是超重几磅而已。

sentences.en: The man was homely and overweight.
sentences.cn: 该男子其貌不扬，身材肥胖。

sentences.en: This parcel is overweight by two kilos.
sentences.cn: 这包裹超重两公斤.

sentences.en: Those who are overweight or indulge in high-salt diets are candidates for hypertension.
sentences.cn: 体重偏高或口味偏咸者易患高血压。

sentences.en: What is the overweight charge?
sentences.cn: 超重的是如何收费的？

sentences.en: Why are so many of us overweight?
sentences.cn: 为什么我们中的许多人会超重？

sentences.en: You're overweight, and I'm going to put you on a diet.
sentences.cn: 你的体重超重了, 必须节食.

sentences.en: Your suitcase is five kilograms overweight.
sentences.cn: 你的衣箱超重五公斤.

words.tran_cn: 价值超出…；比…更重；使苦恼

trans.tran_en: someone who is overweight is too heavy and fat
